actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to allow stock alienation under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act under certain conditions.

summary.text: Amends the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to allow alienation of stock of Regional Corporations by a stockholder who is a member of a professional organization, association, or board which limits his ability to practice his profession because he holds stock issued under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to allow stock alienation under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act under certain conditions.
